♥ A caring and nurturing Mommy who knows how to take care of her little ones. Firm when needed, but always with love at the core of everything.
♥ My bedroom is your safe space - a place where you can let go, be vulnerable, and trust that Mommy will take good care of you in every way.
Nurturing Aftercare ▼
After an intense session, Mommy holds you close, strokes your hair, and whispers sweet affirmations in your ear. Warm blankets, gentle touches, and perhaps a bottle or sippy cup of your favorite drink while you rest your head on Mommy's chest, listening to her heartbeat.
Discipline and Reward ▼
You've been naughty and Mommy must correct your behavior. A firm hand, corner time, or perhaps over the knee - but always followed by reassurance, praise, and rewards for accepting your discipline like a good little one. Remember, Mommy only disciplines because she loves you.
Bath Time ▼
Mommy runs a warm bubble bath with your favorite scents and toys. She washes you thoroughly, taking care of every part of your body while teaching you about proper hygiene. Maybe there's special attention to certain areas that make you squirm and blush.
